description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act to vary the wording of condition 4 (hours of operation) of planning permission ref P101222 dated 25 January 2011 to allow for a gymnasium use within use class D2 to operate 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. NOTE: The original planning permission (ref: P051176) granted on 2 May 2006 granted the: 'erection of a new part 5 storey/part 6 storey building with basement and rooftop plant enclosure, containing a supermarket and mixed commercial space (A1- retail/A2- financial and professional services/A3- restaurants/A4- drinking establishments/A5- takeaways/ B1 - offices/D1 non-residential institutions/D2- assembly and leisure uses) at basement and ground floors; 2,300sq m of office space; 69 flats (including 35% affordable housing); and raised garden at first floor level.'
